mapper.insert: insert address(qid, branch, address, tel, longitude, latitude, deletekey) values(#{qid}, #{branch}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{deletekey})
mapper.update: update address set deletekey=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from address where id=#{id} and deletekey=0
select * from address where qid=#{qid} and deletekey = 0 limit #{pageTool.startrow}, #{pageTool.limit}
select * from address where qid=#{qid} and deletekey = 0
select count(*) from address where qid = #{qid} and deletekey=0
select * from address where qid=#{qid} and branch=#{branch} and deletekey=0 limit 0, 1
select branch from address where qid = #{qid}
